name: SEER Regional Nodes
title: SEER Regional Nodes
notes:
**Note 1:** Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS in this field. Distant nodes are coded in SEER Mets.

**Note 2:**  Regional lymph node involvement for thyroid does not depend on laterality.  All codes for nodal involvement include ipsilateral, bilateral, contralateral, and midline lymph nodes.

**Note 3:** The description of lymph nodes has been standardized across the head and neck schemas for TNM.  Levels I-VII and Other lymph nodes are all now regional. Summary Stage 2000 divides these nodes into regional and distant groups based on the head and neck sub-site.
footnotes:
\### Considered distant in Historic Stage
\*** Considered distant in 1977 Summary Staging Guide
